meanings.definition: A person who serves customers in their cars at a drive-in restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The friendly carhop brought our burgers and fries to the car.
meanings.sent2: The carhop took our order and delivered it to our vehicle with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The carhop juggled trays skillfully, making sure not to drop anything.
meanings.sent4: The carhop was like a mobile waiter, zipping around the parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The carhop's quick service made the dining experience convenient and enjoyable.

meanings.definition: To work as a carhop at a drive-in restaurant.
meanings.sent1: She decided to carhop during the summer to earn some extra money.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys carhopping on weekends because it's a fun job.
meanings.sent3: Carhopping requires good balance to carry trays of food without spilling.
meanings.sent4: They carhopped efficiently, ensuring all customers received their orders promptly.
meanings.sent5: Carhopping involves moving swiftly between cars to deliver orders accurately.
